articles.author: Richard Waters, Emma Dunkley, Laurence Fletcher
articles.title: Hedge funds lose $18bn betting against tech stock rally - Financial Times
articles.description: Robust round of earnings fuel sector rebound that takes short sellers by surprise
articles.content:
Hedge funds betting against US technology stocks have been battered by $18bn of losses after Big Techs robust earnings fuelled a sharp rebound in the sector.

articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: Reported EU legislation to disclose AI training data could trigger copyright lawsuits - The Verge
articles.description: The EU is reportedly considering a provision in its upcoming AI Act that would force companies to disclose the sources of their training data. This could lead to lawsuits by owners of copyrighted data used for training.
articles.content:
